explains: n. 礼貌，彬彬有礼；礼貌的行为（言语）；<古>屈膝礼
adj. 免费提供的；礼节性的
wordGroup: courtesy of 经由…提供；蒙…好意
by courtesy of 蒙…的好意；由于…的作用

sentences.en: The manager of the hotel was courtesy itself.
The president paid a courtesy call on Emperor Akihito.
sentences.cn: 总统礼节性地拜访了明仁天皇。

sentences.en: Good customer relations require courtesy, professionalism and effective response.
sentences.cn: 良好的客户关系需要礼貌、专业和有效的回复。
